mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.state AS "state", a.image_name AS "imageName", a.image_size AS "imageSize", a.image_path AS "imagePath", a.image_type AS "imageType", a.uid AS "uid"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank_image( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, state, image_name, image_size, image_path, image_type, uid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{state}, #{imageName}, #{imageSize}, #{imagePath}, #{imageType}, #{uid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bank_image SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, state = #{state}, image_name = #{imageName}, image_size = #{imageSize}, image_path = #{imagePath}, image_type = #{imageType}, uid = #{uid} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select path from bank_background_image where image_type = #{imageType}
